Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.network

Class ClientConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.observer.Observable<ConnectionObserver>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.network.ClientConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientHandler, NetHandler, java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientConnectionHandler
extends Observable<ConnectionObserver>
implements java.lang.Runnable, ClientHandler
Manages the client behaviour during the communication between client and server
